trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma lista ordenada de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> represents the queue of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> objects associated with a workflow instance and provides methods to manage this queue.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> representa a fila de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> objetos associados a um fluxo de trabalho de instância e fornece métodos para gerenciar essa fila.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions are ordered in the queue based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values; those with smaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values are positioned before those with larger <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: As assinaturas são classificadas na fila com base em seus <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> valores; aquelas com menor <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> valores são posicionados antes daqueles com maior <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> valores.

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods provided by this class to manage the collection of active timer event subscriptions exposed by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> for each workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os métodos fornecidos por esta classe para gerenciar a coleção de assinaturas de evento de temporizador ativo expostos pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> para cada instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> to add or remove subscriptions from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> para adicionar ou remover assinaturas da fila de timer.

trans-unit.source: Whenever the first element in the timer queue changes, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o primeiro elemento na fila de timer for alterado, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> é chamado para cancelar o evento de timer que era anteriormente no início da fila e o novo evento de timer de agendamento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> to add to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> a ser adicionado à fila do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> à fila do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> para a fila de timer.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: As assinaturas na fila são posicionadas com base nas suas <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores; aquelas com valores menores são posicionadas na frente com valores maiores.

trans-unit.source: If the new subscription is added at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: Se a nova assinatura é adicionada no início da fila, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é chamado para cancelar o evento de timer que era anteriormente no início da fila e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> é chamado para agendar o novo evento de timer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> locks the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> before adding the new subscription and is, therefore, thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> bloqueios de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> antes de adicionar nova assinatura e, portanto, thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiados do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Array" /> deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero na <c>array</c> na qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> elements to an existing one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> em um <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional existente, começando no índice da matriz especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.CopyTo%2A> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.CopyTo%2A> é segura para thread.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objects in the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> na fila do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objects in the queue.
trans-unit.target: O número de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objetos na fila.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que itera por meio de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Acesse o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> for sincronizado; no entanto, enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança do thread.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador permanece válido desde que a coleção continue inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Se forem feitas alterações na coleção, como adicionar, modificar ou excluir elementos, o enumerador será invalidado de maneira irrevogável e seu comportamento permanecerá indefinido.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador não tem acesso exclusivo à coleção; Portanto, enumerando através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança do thread.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> durante toda a enumeração usando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" /> indicating that access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <see langword="true" /> indicando que o acesso para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Acesse o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> for sincronizado; no entanto, enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança do thread.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção está sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz o enumerador lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir thread-safe durante a enumeração, é possível bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração ou verificar as exceções resultantes das alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> Retorna um objeto, que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> at the beginning of the timer queue without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> no início da fila do temporizador sem removê-lo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> at the beginning of the timer queue or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the timer queue is empty.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> no início da fila do temporizador ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic), se a fila do temporizador estiver vazia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Peek%2A> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Peek%2A> é segura para thread.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> especificado da fila do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> that has the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> que tem a ID de assinatura especificada da fila do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> with the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> com a id de assinatura especificada da fila de timer.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: As assinaturas na fila são posicionadas com base nas suas <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores; aquelas com valores menores são posicionadas na frente com valores maiores.

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Se a assinatura no início da fila, a assinatura removida <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é chamado para cancelar o evento de temporizador associado com esta assinatura e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> é chamado para agendar um evento de timer para a assinatura que está agora no início da fila.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> é segura para thread.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> to remove from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> a ser removido da fila do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> da fila do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> da fila do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: As assinaturas na fila são posicionadas com base nas suas <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores; aquelas com valores menores são posicionadas na frente com valores maiores.

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Se a assinatura no início da fila, a assinatura removida <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é chamado para cancelar o evento de temporizador associado com esta assinatura e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> é chamado para agendar um evento de timer para a assinatura que está agora no início da fila.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> é segura para thread.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An object used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto usado para sincronizar o acesso a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> Retorna um objeto, que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Acesse o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> for sincronizado; no entanto, enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança do thread.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção está sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz o enumerador lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode o bloqueio de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> durante toda a enumeração usando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> ou capture as exceções resultante de alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: Timer queue associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A fila do temporizador associada à instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This queue contains time ordered <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objects for a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Essa fila contém objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> ordenados por hora para um fluxo de trabalho.
